images.description: Three cherubic angels (putti) in Renaissance painting style, with soft curly blonde hair, rosy cheeks, and delicate white feathered wings. They are depicted floating together in a playful, innocent arrangement. One angel at the top is pointing upward. They wear flowing cream and lavender fabric drapes.
images.style: Classical Renaissance, Baroque-inspired, transparent PNG with no background
images.usage: Decorative element for headers, hero sections, or ambient floating elements

images.description: A single cherubic Cupid figure in Renaissance painting style, depicted as a chubby baby angel with curly blonde hair, rosy cheeks, and white feathered wings. The cherub is aiming a golden bow and arrow, in the classic Cupid/Eros pose. Wears a flowing cream-colored fabric draped around the waist.
images.style: Classical Renaissance, Baroque-inspired, transparent PNG with no background
images.usage: Decorative accent representing creative inspiration or the spark of writing

images.description: A detailed botanical illustration of a large oak tree in classical engraving style. The tree has a thick brown trunk with lush green foliage spreading wide. At the base, there's a small rose bush with pink blooms and grass. The illustration has a vintage, hand-drawn quality typical of 18th-19th century botanical prints.
images.style: Classical botanical illustration, vintage engraving style, white background
images.usage: Background decoration, nature element representing growth and wisdom

images.description: Two classical white marble pillars/columns with elegant Greco-Roman architectural styling. The left pillar features a twisted/spiral (Solomonic) design while the right has traditional vertical fluting (Doric/Ionic style). Both are entwined with climbing ivy vines featuring olive-green leaves that wrap organically around the columns from base to capital.
images.style: Classical architectural elements, 3D rendered, transparent PNG with no background
images.usage: Framing elements for page sections, borders, or creating a gallery/museum aesthetic. Could flank hero sections or content areas.

images.description: A delicate botanical specimen of dried flowering branches, resembling yarrow or Queen Anne's lace. The plant has a slender pale green-gray stem with small clustered flower heads (umbels) in muted sage/dusty green tones. Small leaves branch off the main stem. Has the aesthetic of a pressed herbarium specimen or vintage botanical study.
images.style: Botanical specimen photography, dried flower aesthetic, transparent background
images.usage: Subtle decorative accent, corner embellishments, ambient botanical elements for a refined natural aesthetic

images.description: Museum visitors viewing Botticelli's 'Primavera' (La Primavera, c. 1480) at the Uffizi Gallery in Florence. The famous Renaissance masterpiece is displayed in an ornate golden frame against white gallery walls. Multiple visitors are photographing the artwork with smartphones. A woman in a mustard/ochre coat with a blonde braid is prominently featured in the foreground.
images.style: Documentary photography, museum/gallery setting, candid visitor shot
images.usage: Hero background for gallery feature, representing the experience of viewing masterpieces. Perfect for the Galeri feature context.

images.description: The Tribune (Tribuna) of the Uffizi Gallery in Florence - one of the world's most famous museum rooms. Features an octagonal layout with deep burgundy/oxblood walls adorned with Old Master paintings in ornate gold frames. Classical marble and bronze sculptures on gilded pedestals are arranged throughout, including the Medici Venus at center. The room has an intricate inlaid marble floor with swirling black and white patterns. A domed ceiling with turquoise and gold Renaissance frescoes and natural light from upper windows.
images.style: Architectural photography, museum interior, Renaissance gallery aesthetic
images.usage: Premium background for the Galeri feature, representing the aspiration of building a personal art collection. Evokes the feeling of a private Renaissance gallery.

images.description: A traditional Chinese calligraphy brush resting on a decorative red-brown ceramic brush rest shaped like a foo dog/shishi lion. The brush has a black lacquered handle and white bristle tip. Below is rice paper with traditional vertical red guidelines filled with handwritten Chinese/Japanese calligraphy characters in black ink. The composition evokes the meditative practice of traditional writing.
images.style: Still life photography, Asian calligraphy art, warm natural lighting with shallow depth of field
images.usage: Background or accent for journaling features, representing the timeless art of writing and reflection. Connects journaling to classical literary traditions.

images.description: A soft, painterly illustration of a flowering bush or shrub. The bush has a rounded, dome-like shape with layered green leaves in varying shades from light mint to deep forest green. Delicate pink five-petaled flowers with yellow centers are scattered throughout the foliage. The illustration has a watercolor-like quality with soft edges and gentle gradients.
images.style: Soft watercolor illustration, painterly digital art, transparent/white background
images.usage: Decorative footer element, garden/nature accent, ambient background decoration. Could be used to add organic softness to page layouts.
